programme.title: 1985 Mexico City Earthquake
programme.short_synopsis: The alleged corruption stalling the recovery of Mexico City after a ruinous earthquake.
programme.medium_synopsis: The aftermath of the 1985 earthquake in Mexico, the Canadian concern over the sulphur emissions from power plants in the American Mid-West, and the threat of hurricane Gloria.
